text: Carcoforo is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Vercelli in the Italian region of Piedmont. It is about northeast of Turin and about northwest of Vercelli. Carcoforo is next to these municipalities: Alto Sermenza, Bannio Anzino, Ceppo Morelli, Fobello and Macugnaga. == References == Category:Settlements in Vercelli
title: Carcoforo
